snippet: Concern is growing that hundreds of young Tunisians have been radicalized by Salafist mosques and trained to fight in Syria, with the potential to cause trouble at home.
abstract: Concern is growing in Tunisia that hundreds of young Tunisians have been radicalized by Salafist mosques and trained to fight in Syria, with potential to cause trouble at home.
lead_paragraph: Concern is growing that hundreds of young Tunisians have been radicalized by Salafist mosques and trained to fight in Syria, with the potential to cause trouble at home.

headline.main: Worry in Tunisia Over Youths Who Turn to Jihad
headline.print_headline: Worry in Tunisia Over Youths Who Turn to Jihad
